--- In junit@y..., Vladimir Bossicard <vladimir@b...> wrote:
> > We have modified the JUnit source to get this working, but:
> >  
> >  - is there a particular reason why it isn't (there seems
> >    to be explicit comments in the code saying it doesn't work)
> >  - any plans to get it working?
> 
> If I understand you right:
> - you have modified the code to get it working
> - you're asking when JUnit will modify the code to get it working
> 
> The answer is: "Share your code!"  Send your modification to 
www.sourceforge.net/projects/junit or make it available on the web.
> 
> -Vladimir
